alterego_mod:ClassAdvantagePower.NAME: Class Advantage
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal 15% more damage. Take 15% less damage.

alterego_mod:ClassAdvantageLitePower.NAME: Class Advantage
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal 10% more damage. Take 10% less damage.

alterego_mod:PainIsPleasurePower.NAME: Pain is Pleasure
DESCRIPTIONS: Taking damage instead heals you this turn.

alterego_mod:PunishmentPower.NAME: Punishment
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand. Each turn, gain [E].

alterego_mod:PunishmentPowerUpgraded.NAME: Punishment
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, lose 1 HP for every 2 cards in your hand. Each turn, gain [E].
